project_plan.name: Python-Based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Design a Python quiz game that presents multiple-choice questions to the user, tracks their score, and displays the final score at the end.

task.name: Define the quiz questions and answers within the code
Implement the functionality to display questions and handle user input for answers
Keep track of the user's score based on correct answers
Implement the logic to display the final score at the end of the game
Write tests for the functionality of the quiz game (questions display, scoring logic)
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
